title: i want to remove my account
body: i want to remove my account..

replies.body:
In order to make this type of request, you'll need to write into our account specialists in a [support ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I know I wasn't the one who asked this question, but this is helpful. I think ill try it
